column5: All this talk about ice...Ha! I'll be catching(WILD) bows midweek in my favorite tribs on the north shore of LO.  Chris
Good luck, if it rains enough to bust the ice out its gonna be blown till its cold again.

never have any troubles on the big trib I fish until April when they let the ice boom go then it's a couple days of no fishin and a couple days of dodging ice bergs, then it's good to go again until the water gets too warm

I decided to take a drive today (gear in car of course) and check out some here in Durham.  ALL spots were frozen that I went to.  Mind you I don't know the good spots so I was just guessing of places from old posts and using my GPS to show me the rivers.  If anyone would be interested in taking a NEWBY to river fishing out PM me as I would love to give it a proper try.  Cheers. Geoff
Hey jwl!!!  Let's keep it quiet.   :lol: Otherwise there wont be any room left for us.  :lol:  Cheers
